description: CPDX files are the main file type associated with Captivate Draft. The mobile app creates a CPDX file when saving a project. The project files are autosaved whenever you close Captivate Draft. After you are done editing your storyboard you can export it to Captivate to refine and finish the project.
To import a CPDX file into Captivate select File → New Project → Project from Adobe Captivate Draft... , navigate to your CPDX file, and click Open .
NOTE: Adobe discontinued the development of Captivate Draft in July 2019.
